mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "HYF"."BIL_ELEME_EVALUATE" (ID, SHOP_ID, CRAWLER_DATE, EVA_VALUE, QUALITY, GOODS) VALUES (#{id},#{shopId},#{crawlerDate},#{evaValue},#{quality},#{goods})

INSERT INTO "HYF"."BIL_ELEME_ACTIVITY" (ID, SHOP_ID, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, NAME, STATUS, CONTENT, CREATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, IS_SHARE) VALUES (#{id},#{shopId},#{beginDate},#{endDate},#{name},#{status},#{content},#{createTime},#{description},#{isShare})

INSERT INTO "HYF"."BIL_ELEME_BILL" (CLOSUBG_DATE, INCOME, EXPENSE, DEDUCT_AMOUNT, DUE_AMOUNT, PAY_AMOUNT, PAYMENT_DATE, SHOP_ID) VALUES (#{closingDate},#{income},#{expense},#{deductAmount},#{dueAmount},#{payAmount},#{paymentDate},#{shopId})

INSERT INTO "HYF"."BIL_ELEME_COMMODITY" (MESSAGE_DATE, SHOP_ID, FOOD_NAME, SALES_AMOUNT, SALES_AMOUNT_RATE, SALES_VOLUME, SALES_VOLUME_RATE) VALUES (#{messageDate},#{shopId},#{foodName},#{salesAmount},#{salesAmountRate},#{salesVolume},#{salesVolumeRate})
